subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: David Beckham equaled Bobby Moore’s record for most appearances by a player for England other than a goalkeeper. Beckham replaced Stewart Downing in the 46th minute of an exhibition game in Spain on Wednesday. That gave him 108 appearances, second only to goalkeeper Peter Shilton’s 125.
